name: Bella
description: Bella is a friendly and energetic Labrador who loves to play fetch and enjoys long walks. She is great with kids and other pets.

name: Max
description: Max is a curious and intelligent Siamese cat. He enjoys lounging in sunny spots and playing with feather toys. Max would do best in a quiet home.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is a playful Beagle with a keen sense of smell. He loves exploring new places and is very affectionate. He gets along well with other dogs.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a gentle and loving Maine Coon. She enjoys being brushed and petted. Luna is looking for a forever home where she can be the center of attention.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a sweet and calm Holland Lop rabbit. She loves munching on fresh vegetables and enjoys being cuddled. Daisy would be a great addition to any family.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a loyal and protective German Shepherd. He is well-trained and enjoys playing frisbee. Rocky is looking for an active family who can keep up with his energy.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a calm and affectionate British Shorthair. He loves napping in cozy spots and enjoys interactive toys. Milo would do well in a home with other cats.

name: Coco
description: Coco is a playful and curious Mini Rex rabbit. She loves exploring her surroundings and enjoys nibbling on hay. Coco would be a great companion for a family with children.
